---------------------------------------------
R4 TEST 


2^50 + -2^2 *2^10 = 1125899906838528


01010
R10 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R10 with 0000000000000100 at index 3 - 011
LI R10 with 0000000000000100 at index 7 - 111

00101
R5 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R5 with 1111111111111111 at index 3 - 011
LI R5 with 1111111111111100 at index 2 - 010
LI R5 with 1111111111111111 at index 7 - 111
LI R5 with 1111111111111100 at index 6 - 110



00001
R1 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R1 with 0000010000000000 at index  2 - 010
LI R1 with 0000010000000000 at index  6 - 110

 
00000
R0 gets result.

Opcode
1010100001001010101000000


program:

0011000000000000010001010 
0111000000000000010001010 
0011111111111111111100101 
0010111111111111110000101 
0111111111111111111100101 
0110111111111111110000101
0010000001000000000000001 
0110000001000000000000001
1010100001001010101000000





passes.

---------------------------------------------------
